book.title: Whale Wally's Fruits And Vegetables Collection
book.style: black-and-white coloring page, kid-friendly, thick clean outlines, minimal detail, high contrast, no grayscale, no text
book.negative: color, grey, shading, gradients, tiny patterns, cluttered backgrounds, logos, watermarks, photorealism, text, numbers, letters, words
book.cover_prompt: blue whale with water spout with captain's hat in Crystal Cave; heart-shaped crystal floating nearby; glowing crystals in background; underground pools at sides; vibrant colors, book cover illustration, no text, child-friendly
book.back_blurb: Join Whale Wally on a wonderful collections adventure in Crystal Cave!

pages.text: Welcome to Whale Wally's fruits and vegetables adventure!
pages.scene: blue whale with water spout with captain's hat standing at entrance; welcome sign with pictures; glowing crystals framing scene

pages.text: Look! Whale Wally found a Lion!
pages.scene: blue whale with water spout pointing at proud lion with mane; sitting on rock with tail swishing; captain's hat visible; simple background with gem formations

pages.text: Look! Whale Wally found a Elephant!
pages.scene: blue whale with water spout pointing at grey elephant with trunk; spraying water playfully; captain's hat visible; simple background with glowing crystals

pages.text: Look! Whale Wally found a Giraffe!
pages.scene: blue whale with water spout pointing at tall giraffe with spots; eating leaves from tall tree; captain's hat visible; simple background with underground pools

pages.text: Whale Wally learned about so many wonderful things!
pages.scene: blue whale with water spout surrounded by small versions of all the items; happy expression; glowing crystals in background
